initialize
release
lock

nodes.documentation: @title A scheme for locking ERC20 Tokens for reputation
nodes.name: LockingToken4Reputation
initialize
release
lock

params._avatar: the avatar to mint reputation from
params._lockingEndTime: the locking end time.       locking is disable after this time.
params._priceOracleContract: the price oracle contract which the locked token will be       validated against
params._redeemEnableTime: redeem enable time .       redeem reputation can be done after this time.
params._reputationReward: the total reputation this contract will reward       for the token locking

params._token: the token to lock - this should be whitelisted at the priceOracleContract

devdoc.title: A scheme for locking ERC20 Tokens for reputation
